name: behat/mink
description: Web acceptance testing framework for PHP 5.3

name: behat/mink-browserkit-driver
description: Symfony2 BrowserKit driver for Mink framework

suggest.symfony/config: If you want to use Config component to manage resources
suggest.symfony/translation: If you want to use Symfony2 translations adapter
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you want to parse features, represented in YAML files

suggest.behat/mink-extension: for integration with Mink testing framework
suggest.behat/symfony2-extension: for integration with Symfony2 web framework
suggest.behat/yii-extension: for integration with Yii web framework

name: phpunit/php-file-iterator
description: FilterIterator implementation that filters files based on a list of suffixes.

name: phpunit/php-code-coverage
description: Library that provides collection, processing, and rendering functionality for PHP code coverage information.

name: sauce/sausage
description: PHP version of the Sauce Labs API

name: sauce/connect
description: PHP package for the Sauce Connect Java binary

name: guzzle/guzzle
description: Guzzle is a PHP HTTP client library and framework for building RESTful web service clients
